features: Portable Travel Mouthwash. The convenient travel sized mouthwash helps fight bad breath without any strong irritation. It can be used after meals, drinking coffee or social dating.

Powerful Strong cleaning power - The travel sized mouthwash can deeply clean the gaps between teeth, remove dead corners, soften tooth stains, and protect the oral environment 360 °. It also has a refreshing mint flavor, which can keep you fresh for hours!

Airline approval. Our Airline approved mouthwash packets are great for airplane traveling. Each purchase will give you 40 bags of Oidooin travel sized mouthwash, enough for your travel and dating nights. One for each use, compact and convenient, available anytime and anywhere

Natural liquid formula. Super mild. 99.7% alcohol free, certified non-toxic, no stings or burns, no preservatives, and our personal mouthwash does not contain artificial dyes, colors, or any rough ingredients that may contaminate clothing.

Long Fresh Breath. The upgraded version of 'Persistent Fresh Breath' has a stronger mint flavor, and the fresh breath lasts for more than 8 hours. After using your favorite fragrant food, traveling, or camping, immediately freshen your breath and reduce embarrassment.You don't have to worry about the leakage of the travel mouthwash. No matter where you use it, the ingenious and sturdy packaging is leak proof and easy to tear and open when needed.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Portable Strip Mouthwash These Travel Mouthwash packets are portable items that are just right for airline Travelling, Business outings as well as Accommodation. Individual Mini mouthwash Packet size is easy to use or keep in pockets. Mouthwash deeply cleanses your dry mouth and helps fight bad breath without any overpowering sensation.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent for travel
reviews.reviewText: No more spills or containers that leak. Great for after lunch throw a few in your purse or glove compartment to freshen up on the run

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for travel
reviews.reviewText: although great for traveling, I stick these in my handbag for use when I am away from home. No mess, easy to use, good flavor. Great idea

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Took these with us when we went on a cruise and they are so convenient and great taste and results! Love the packaging too no spills!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Does the job
reviews.reviewText: I was looking for an affordable mouthwash for work days that I could just throw in my purse or pocket for use after eating lunch. These come in individual small packets so they are very portable. Easy to tear open and pour in your mouth, and the flavor is ok. I wish they had a little more solution though but they do the job.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Love these. Great for travel or for just freshening up your breath. Just enough mouthwash in one pouch. It doesn't burn your tongue like a lot of them for it to work. If you're traveling or just want to freshen your breath, get some. The package is thick enough where it won't burst if you through them in your bag or purse.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for travel.
reviews.reviewText: Good mouthwash for travel. I was carrying mouthwash in small travel bottles that would open and leak from time to time and create a mess. Also good to throw a few in your pocket for after a meal in a restaurant.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars It’s just Mouthwash..
reviews.reviewText: I mean it’s what it is. Regular mouthwash. Not so tasty(which is not suppose to be) but I wish it could be a little stronger. Also, you need scissors babe! I couldn’t tear it with my teeth. I mean, eh do I I think I am anyways trying to bite it off.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Would buy again
reviews.reviewText: These were excellent for my trip to Mexico!
